page.title: 14PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: Even playground games are following the advances made in modern technology. An old favourite called 'Crossing the Bridge' has now been renamed 'Space Invaders' the rules for playing are as follows. One person is 'on it' and he/she is armed with a ball. The rest of the children line up on one side of the playground. Whoever is 'on it' calls out a persons name and that person must try to cross the playground without being hit by the ball the player throws at him. If he is successful then all the others cross as well, if he is unsuccessful then the person 'on it' calls for someone else from the opposition. This goes on until only one person remains and then that person is given the ball and the game begins again.
